Beautifully updated ranch home on the Au Train River in Michigan's Upper Peninsula. Inside you are treated to an entirely updated home with newer hardwood flooring in the main areas custom tile floors and showers in both bathrooms and new tile floor and custom woodgrain tile countertops and stainless farm sink in the recently remodeled mudroom/laundry room. New electrical panel 2017. Kitchen features stainless appliances beautiful tile splash reverse osmosis drinking water system at the tap centrally located gas insert fireplace with custom made wood mantle limestone surround and tiled hearth. Custom cellular shades throughout with top down bottom up featured in the living area overlooking the river. Newer natural gas boiler and direct fired hot water heater. Bedrooms have new carpet five new windows and all rooms in the home have been recently painted. This is an amazing one floor living home with a view of nature like few others can provide. Close to Lake Superior beaches Au Train Lake Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore and a great location to enjoy all four seasons that our beautiful UP has to offer.
